description:
Supernatural powers take center stage in the battle to save Ace as Luffy and his uniquely talented allies throw down with the Navy`s own arsenal of Devil Fruit Eaters!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gekisen no Renzoku! Nouryokusha Gundan VS Nouryokusha Gundan
Hard Battles, One After Another! Devil Fruit Eaters vs. Devil Fruit Eaters!
Les combats s`enchainent ! Fruits du démon contre fruits du démon
Тяжeлые битвы, одна за другой! Фруктовики против фруктовиков!
激戦の連続! 能力者軍団VS能力者軍団
